mapper.select: select f.f_diary_no, f.writer, f.my_simple_code, mysim.code_alias code_alias, f.content, f.reg_dt, f.weather, f.low_temp, f.high_temp, f.rainfall, f.humid, f.yield, f.area, files.file_nm file_nm, c.code_nm b_type_code, co.code_nm w_step_code, cod.code_nm item_code from farmdiary f JOIN codes c ON f.b_type_code = c.code_no JOIN codes co ON f.w_step_code = co.code_no JOIN codes cod ON f.item_code = cod.code_no JOIN files files ON f.file_no = files.file_no JOIN mysimplecode mysim ON f.my_simple_code = mysim.my_simple_code where f.use_yn = 'Y' and c.use_yn = 'Y' and co.use_yn = 'Y' and cod.use_yn = 'Y' and files.use_yn ='Y' and mysim.use_yn = 'Y' and writer = #{writer } ORDER BY reg_dt desc

select * from codes where parent_code = (select code_no from codes where code_nm = #{code_nm }) AND use_yn = 'Y'

select f.f_diary_no, f.writer, f.my_simple_code, mysim.code_alias code_alias, f.content, f.reg_dt, f.weather, f.low_temp, f.high_temp, f.rainfall, f.humid, f.yield, f.area, files.file_nm file_nm, c.code_nm b_type_code, co.code_nm w_step_code, cod.code_nm item_code from farmdiary f JOIN codes c ON f.b_type_code = c.code_no JOIN codes co ON f.w_step_code = co.code_no JOIN codes cod ON f.item_code = cod.code_no JOIN files files ON f.file_no = files.file_no JOIN mysimplecode mysim ON f.my_simple_code = mysim.my_simple_code where f.reg_dt >= TO_DATE(#{startDate }, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND f.reg_dt < TO_DATE(#{endDate }, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 AND f.writer = #{writer } AND f.item_code = #{item_code } AND f.use_yn = 'Y' and c.use_yn = 'Y' and co.use_yn = 'Y' and cod.use_yn = 'Y' and files.use_yn ='Y' and mysim.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY f.reg_dt desc
